content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":174431,"originalJapaneseLine":"徐々に世界から姿を消し始める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gradually, it begins to disappear from the world."},{"lineNumber":174432,"originalJapaneseLine":"――戦争が終わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"-- The war ends."},{"lineNumber":174433,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":174434,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":174435,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界のどこかの戦場――","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhere on a battlefield in the world--"},{"lineNumber":174436,"originalJapaneseLine":"「撤退だとォ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Retreat!?\""},{"lineNumber":174437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふざけるな！　こんなとこで終わらせられるか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't be ridiculous! We won't end it here!\""},{"lineNumber":174438,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦いは魔軍の方が圧勝しているんだぜ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon army has the overwhelming victory!\""},{"lineNumber":174439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだだ！　まだ終わってねー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not yet! It's not over yet!\""},{"lineNumber":174440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺達ァ、まだまだ戦え――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can still keep fighting--!\""},{"lineNumber":174441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぎゃっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gugya!?\""},{"lineNumber":174442,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人喚いていた魔物隊長は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster captain who was shouting alone,"},{"lineNumber":174443,"originalJapaneseLine":"背後から魔物将軍に殴られ気絶した。","translatedEnglishLine":"was struck from behind by the demon general and knocked unconscious."},{"lineNumber":174444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬ー鹿、戦いは終わったんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot, the fight is over.\""},{"lineNumber":174445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、お前ら。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you guys."},{"lineNumber":174446,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと撤収の準備だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Prepare to withdraw quickly."},{"lineNumber":174447,"originalJapaneseLine":"　急げよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurry up.\""},{"lineNumber":174448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes!\""},{"lineNumber":174449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……大将ケイブリスが敗れた以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Since General Kavebris has been defeated,"},{"lineNumber":174450,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺らをまとめられる奴がもういねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's no one left to unite us."},{"lineNumber":174451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺達の負けだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've lost.\""},{"lineNumber":174452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But still..."},{"lineNumber":174453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのひ弱な人間に負けるとはなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't believe we lost to that frail human.\""},{"lineNumber":174454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「連中、大したもんだぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those guys are amazing.\""},{"lineNumber":174455,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類の平和。","translatedEnglishLine":"Peace for humanity."},{"lineNumber":174456,"originalJapaneseLine":"何千年もの昔から願われ続けた、人類共通の悲願。","translatedEnglishLine":"A common fervent wish of humanity, desired for thousands of years."},{"lineNumber":174457,"originalJapaneseLine":"約2300年前、藤原石丸という名の侍がJAPANにいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"About 2300 years ago, there was a samurai named Ishimaru Fujiwara in JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":174458,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼は驚異的な武力を以てまずJAPANを統一、","translatedEnglishLine":"He first unified JAPAN with astonishing military power,"},{"lineNumber":174459,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかる後に大陸の半分ほどを支配するに至り、魔王討伐を目指す。","translatedEnglishLine":"and then came to control about half the continent, aiming to defeat the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":174460,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、時の魔王ナイチサに命じられた魔人ザビエルがこれを討ち、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the demon Xavier, ordered by the Demon King Naichisa of the time, defeated him,"},{"lineNumber":174461,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類の希望は儚く潰えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and humanity’s hope was fleetingly crushed."},{"lineNumber":174462,"originalJapaneseLine":"それから約1600年後、ルーカ・ルーンという魔法使いが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"About 1600 years later, a sorcerer named Luka Rune appeared."},{"lineNumber":174463,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼は歴史上において初の人類統一を成し遂げ、","translatedEnglishLine":"He achieved the first unification of humanity in history,"},{"lineNumber":174464,"originalJapaneseLine":"聖魔教団という強大かつ強力な国を作り上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and established a strong and powerful nation called the Holy Demon Church."},{"lineNumber":174465,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的は無論、魔を打ち倒し、人類の恒久的な平和を手にすること。","translatedEnglishLine":"His goal was, of course, to defeat the demons and gain eternal peace for humanity."},{"lineNumber":174466,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、これは大勢の魔人達との闘争、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, this ended due to conflicts with numerous demons,"},{"lineNumber":174467,"originalJapaneseLine":"仲間であった筈の人類からの裏切りという悲劇により潰える。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the tragedy of betrayal from humanity who were supposed to be allies."},{"lineNumber":174468,"originalJapaneseLine":"気の遠くなるような長い年月、人類は虐げられ続けてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"For an overwhelmingly long time, humanity has been continuously oppressed."},{"lineNumber":174469,"originalJapaneseLine":"……そして、ある一人の男が歴史上に姿を見せる。","translatedEnglishLine":"...And then, a certain man appears in history."},{"lineNumber":174470,"originalJapaneseLine":"その男、各国が窮地に陥ると颯爽と現れ、","translatedEnglishLine":"This man would promptly appear whenever countries were in dire straits,"},{"lineNumber":174471,"originalJapaneseLine":"破竹の勢いによる活躍をもって平和へ導く。","translatedEnglishLine":"leading them toward peace with unstoppable momentum."},{"lineNumber":174472,"originalJapaneseLine":"時にはなんの因縁もない難敵にすら立ち向かい、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes he even stood up to formidable enemies with no prior grudge,"},{"lineNumber":174473,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の危機を幾度となく救い、大した褒美も得ずに姿を消した。","translatedEnglishLine":"saving the world from crisis countless times before vanishing without any great reward."},{"lineNumber":174474,"originalJapaneseLine":"かくしてこの男、各国の指導者からの篤い信頼を得、","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, this man earned the deep trust of leaders of various countries,"},{"lineNumber":174475,"originalJapaneseLine":"史上初となる武力に頼らぬ平和的な人類統一を成し遂げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and achieved the first-ever peaceful unification of humanity without relying on military force."},{"lineNumber":174476,"originalJapaneseLine":"長い間、冷戦状態にあった各国が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Countries that had been in a long-standing Cold War,"},{"lineNumber":174477,"originalJapaneseLine":"たった一人の男を信じ、手に手を取り合ったのである。","translatedEnglishLine":"trusted this single man and joined hands together."},{"lineNumber":174478,"originalJapaneseLine":"史上二度目となる魔軍との戦争においては、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the second war against the demon army in history,"},{"lineNumber":174479,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類全てを率い、勇敢にも矢面に立ち戦い続けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"he led all of humanity, bravely standing at the forefront and continuing the fight."},{"lineNumber":174480,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰にも成し得なかった勝利、誰にも達成出来なかった難事を、","translatedEnglishLine":"He made possible victories no one else could achieve, accomplishing difficult tasks no one had managed before,"},{"lineNumber":174481,"originalJapaneseLine":"己の実力と、多くの優秀な仲間、そして時の運で可能にする。","translatedEnglishLine":"through his own skill, many capable comrades, and timely fortune."},{"lineNumber":174482,"originalJapaneseLine":"第二次魔人戦争。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Second Demon War."},{"lineNumber":174483,"originalJapaneseLine":"人と魔の全面戦争はこの男の手により勝利へ導かれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The full-scale war between humans and demons was led to victory by this man."},{"lineNumber":174484,"originalJapaneseLine":"かつての英傑達が成し遂げられなかった偉業、","translatedEnglishLine":"An achievement that great heroes of the past could not accomplish,"},{"lineNumber":174485,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔への勝利を史上初めて達成したのは――","translatedEnglishLine":"the first-ever victory over demons in history--was accomplished by"},{"lineNumber":174486,"originalJapaneseLine":"意外にも素性すら知れぬ時代の風雲児の手によってのものとなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"an unexpected rising star of an era whose origin was even unknown."},{"lineNumber":174487,"originalJapaneseLine":"英雄ランス――","translatedEnglishLine":"The hero Rance--"},{"lineNumber":174488,"originalJapaneseLine":"その名は、偉大な英雄として、","translatedEnglishLine":"That name, as a great hero,"},{"lineNumber":174489,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界に永く語り継がれることとなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"would be remembered and told throughout the world for a long time."},{"lineNumber":174490,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々に世界から姿を消し始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gradually, it begins to disappear from the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――戦争が終わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- The war ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のどこかの戦場――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere on a battlefield in the world--

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撤退だとォ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Retreat!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふざけるな！　こんなとこで終わらせられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't be ridiculous! We won't end it here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは魔軍の方が圧勝しているんだぜ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army has the overwhelming victory!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだだ！　まだ終わってねー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not yet! It's not over yet!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達ァ、まだまだ戦え――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can still keep fighting--!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぎゃっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gugya!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人喚いていた魔物隊長は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain who was shouting alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後から魔物将軍に殴られ気絶した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was struck from behind by the demon general and knocked unconscious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、戦いは終わったんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot, the fight is over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーい、お前ら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと撤収の準備だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prepare to withdraw quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急げよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……大将ケイブリスが敗れた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Since General Kavebris has been defeated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らをまとめられる奴がもういねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no one left to unite us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達の負けだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We've lost."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But still...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのひ弱な人間に負けるとはなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't believe we lost to that frail human."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連中、大したもんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those guys are amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の平和。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peace for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何千年もの昔から願われ続けた、人類共通の悲願。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A common fervent wish of humanity, desired for thousands of years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 約2300年前、藤原石丸という名の侍がJAPANにいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 2300 years ago, there was a samurai named Ishimaru Fujiwara in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は驚異的な武力を以てまずJAPANを統一、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He first unified JAPAN with astonishing military power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかる後に大陸の半分ほどを支配するに至り、魔王討伐を目指す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then came to control about half the continent, aiming to defeat the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、時の魔王ナイチサに命じられた魔人ザビエルがこれを討ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the demon Xavier, ordered by the Demon King Naichisa of the time, defeated him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の希望は儚く潰えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and humanity’s hope was fleetingly crushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから約1600年後、ルーカ・ルーンという魔法使いが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 1600 years later, a sorcerer named Luka Rune appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は歴史上において初の人類統一を成し遂げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He achieved the first unification of humanity in history,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団という強大かつ強力な国を作り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and established a strong and powerful nation called the Holy Demon Church.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的は無論、魔を打ち倒し、人類の恒久的な平和を手にすること。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His goal was, of course, to defeat the demons and gain eternal peace for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、これは大勢の魔人達との闘争、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this ended due to conflicts with numerous demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間であった筈の人類からの裏切りという悲劇により潰える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the tragedy of betrayal from humanity who were supposed to be allies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気の遠くなるような長い年月、人類は虐げられ続けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For an overwhelmingly long time, humanity has been continuously oppressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……そして、ある一人の男が歴史上に姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...And then, a certain man appears in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その男、各国が窮地に陥ると颯爽と現れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This man would promptly appear whenever countries were in dire straits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破竹の勢いによる活躍をもって平和へ導く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading them toward peace with unstoppable momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時にはなんの因縁もない難敵にすら立ち向かい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes he even stood up to formidable enemies with no prior grudge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の危機を幾度となく救い、大した褒美も得ずに姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saving the world from crisis countless times before vanishing without any great reward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かくしてこの男、各国の指導者からの篤い信頼を得、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, this man earned the deep trust of leaders of various countries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 史上初となる武力に頼らぬ平和的な人類統一を成し遂げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and achieved the first-ever peaceful unification of humanity without relying on military force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い間、冷戦状態にあった各国が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Countries that had been in a long-standing Cold War,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一人の男を信じ、手に手を取り合ったのである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trusted this single man and joined hands together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 史上二度目となる魔軍との戦争においては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the second war against the demon army in history,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類全てを率い、勇敢にも矢面に立ち戦い続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he led all of humanity, bravely standing at the forefront and continuing the fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰にも成し得なかった勝利、誰にも達成出来なかった難事を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made possible victories no one else could achieve, accomplishing difficult tasks no one had managed before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の実力と、多くの優秀な仲間、そして時の運で可能にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: through his own skill, many capable comrades, and timely fortune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第二次魔人戦争。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Second Demon War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人と魔の全面戦争はこの男の手により勝利へ導かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The full-scale war between humans and demons was led to victory by this man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かつての英傑達が成し遂げられなかった偉業、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An achievement that great heroes of the past could not accomplish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔への勝利を史上初めて達成したのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the first-ever victory over demons in history--was accomplished by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外にも素性すら知れぬ時代の風雲児の手によってのものとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an unexpected rising star of an era whose origin was even unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 英雄ランス――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero Rance--

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その名は、偉大な英雄として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That name, as a great hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界に永く語り継がれることとなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be remembered and told throughout the world for a long time.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々に世界から姿を消し始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gradually, it begins to disappear from the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――戦争が終わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- The war ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のどこかの戦場――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere on a battlefield in the world--

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撤退だとォ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Retreat!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふざけるな！　こんなとこで終わらせられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't be ridiculous! We won't end it here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは魔軍の方が圧勝しているんだぜ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army has the overwhelming victory!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだだ！　まだ終わってねー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not yet! It's not over yet!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達ァ、まだまだ戦え――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can still keep fighting--!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぎゃっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gugya!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人喚いていた魔物隊長は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain who was shouting alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後から魔物将軍に殴られ気絶した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was struck from behind by the demon general and knocked unconscious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、戦いは終わったんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot, the fight is over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーい、お前ら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと撤収の準備だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prepare to withdraw quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急げよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……大将ケイブリスが敗れた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Since General Kavebris has been defeated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らをまとめられる奴がもういねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no one left to unite us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達の負けだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We've lost."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But still...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのひ弱な人間に負けるとはなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't believe we lost to that frail human."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連中、大したもんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those guys are amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の平和。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peace for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何千年もの昔から願われ続けた、人類共通の悲願。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A common fervent wish of humanity, desired for thousands of years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 約2300年前、藤原石丸という名の侍がJAPANにいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 2300 years ago, there was a samurai named Ishimaru Fujiwara in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は驚異的な武力を以てまずJAPANを統一、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He first unified JAPAN with astonishing military power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかる後に大陸の半分ほどを支配するに至り、魔王討伐を目指す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then came to control about half the continent, aiming to defeat the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、時の魔王ナイチサに命じられた魔人ザビエルがこれを討ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the demon Xavier, ordered by the Demon King Naichisa of the time, defeated him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の希望は儚く潰えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and humanity’s hope was fleetingly crushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから約1600年後、ルーカ・ルーンという魔法使いが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 1600 years later, a sorcerer named Luka Rune appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は歴史上において初の人類統一を成し遂げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He achieved the first unification of humanity in history,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団という強大かつ強力な国を作り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and established a strong and powerful nation called the Holy Demon Church.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的は無論、魔を打ち倒し、人類の恒久的な平和を手にすること。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His goal was, of course, to defeat the demons and gain eternal peace for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、これは大勢の魔人達との闘争、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this ended due to conflicts with numerous demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間であった筈の人類からの裏切りという悲劇により潰える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the tragedy of betrayal from humanity who were supposed to be allies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気の遠くなるような長い年月、人類は虐げられ続けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For an overwhelmingly long time, humanity has been continuously oppressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……そして、ある一人の男が歴史上に姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...And then, a certain man appears in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その男、各国が窮地に陥ると颯爽と現れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This man would promptly appear whenever countries were in dire straits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破竹の勢いによる活躍をもって平和へ導く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading them toward peace with unstoppable momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時にはなんの因縁もない難敵にすら立ち向かい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes he even stood up to formidable enemies with no prior grudge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の危機を幾度となく救い、大した褒美も得ずに姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saving the world from crisis countless times before vanishing without any great reward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かくしてこの男、各国の指導者からの篤い信頼を得、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, this man earned the deep trust of leaders of various countries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 史上初となる武力に頼らぬ平和的な人類統一を成し遂げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and achieved the first-ever peaceful unification of humanity without relying on military force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い間、冷戦状態にあった各国が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Countries that had been in a long-standing Cold War,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一人の男を信じ、手に手を取り合ったのである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trusted this single man and joined hands together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 史上二度目となる魔軍との戦争においては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the second war against the demon army in history,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類全てを率い、勇敢にも矢面に立ち戦い続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he led all of humanity, bravely standing at the forefront and continuing the fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰にも成し得なかった勝利、誰にも達成出来なかった難事を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made possible victories no one else could achieve, accomplishing difficult tasks no one had managed before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の実力と、多くの優秀な仲間、そして時の運で可能にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: through his own skill, many capable comrades, and timely fortune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第二次魔人戦争。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Second Demon War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人と魔の全面戦争はこの男の手により勝利へ導かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The full-scale war between humans and demons was led to victory by this man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かつての英傑達が成し遂げられなかった偉業、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An achievement that great heroes of the past could not accomplish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔への勝利を史上初めて達成したのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the first-ever victory over demons in history--was accomplished by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外にも素性すら知れぬ時代の風雲児の手によってのものとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an unexpected rising star of an era whose origin was even unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 英雄ランス――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero Rance--

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その名は、偉大な英雄として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That name, as a great hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界に永く語り継がれることとなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be remembered and told throughout the world for a long time.
